Detailed Description

template<int DIM>
class SAMRAI::pdat::OuterfaceGeometry< DIM >

Class OuterfaceGeometry<DIM> manages the mapping between the AMR index and the outerface geometry index space. It is a subclass of hier::BoxGeometry<DIM> and it computes intersections between outerface box geometries and face or outerface box geometries for communication operations.

See header file for OuterfaceData<DIM> class for a more detailed description of the data layout.

See also:
hier::BoxGeometry

pdat::FaceGeometry

pdat::FaceOverlap
